**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 41 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 [Bloomborn Athach](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2348) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 434 **Perception** +31; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32 **Str** +9 **Dex** +5 **Con** +6 **Int** +2 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +5 --- **AC** 40 **Fort** +33 **Ref** +30 **Will** +31 **HP** 375 **Weaknesses** cold iron 15 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** At the start of each of its turns, the bloomborn athach gains an extra reaction that it can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity with its claw.
**[Catch Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=7)** --- **Speed** 40 feet **Melee** fist +34 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+17 bludgeoning **Melee** jaws +34, **Damage** 3d12+17 piercing plus athach venom **Melee** claw +34 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 3d8+17 slashing **Ranged** rock +34 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 3d4+17 bludgeoning **Athach Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 38 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage and [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) 1; **Stage 2** 2d6 poison damage and enfeebled 2; **Stage 3** 2d6 poison damage and enfeebled 3 **Swift Claw** **Trigger** The athach hits a creature with two fist Strikes; **Effect** The athach makes a claw Strike with no multiple attack penalty against the creature it hit with its fist Strikes. This claw attack does not increase the athach's multiple attack penalty. **[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)**
name: Bloomborn Athach
